### Information Technology (IT) Asset Management Services
#### RFP Reference: INFC-2022-23-PS4446
#### Issuing Office: Office of Infrastructure of Canada, Directorate of Operations Support, Security, and Information Management (OSSIM)

**Request for Proposal Overview**

The Office of Infrastructure of Canada is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to provide IT Asset Management Services to support the management and tracking of IT inventory across Canada.

### Description of Services

The proposed supplier will be required to provide resources with expertise in IT asset management to work collaboratively with Infrastructure Canada personnel to manage and track IT inventory, assist with the distribution and shipping of IT equipment to personnel across Canada, and wipe content on returned computers and image new computers.

### Contract Details

* **Contract Duration**: Up to two (2) years, with an option to extend for three additional one-year periods.
* **Estimated Delivery Date**: 2025-03-12.
* **Level of Effort**: Up to 240 days per year for 4 resources in the initial contract period, and up to 240 days per year for 6 resources in the option years.
* **Security Requirement**: Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Enhanced Reliability are required.

### Tendering Procedure and Evaluation Criteria

This opportunity is open to all qualified suppliers. Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The evaluation will be based on the supplier's profile, technical expertise, past experience, and the proposal submitted.

### Key Dates

* **Publication Date**: January 5, 2023.
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 14, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time EST.
* **Anticipated Start Date**: March 13, 2023.

### Contact Information

Inquiries regarding this RFP should be directed to [procurement-approvisionnement@infc.gc.ca](mailto:procurement-approvisionnement@infc.gc.ca). Documents may be submitted in either official language.

### Attachments

The RFP document and all attachments are available on [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). Please note that all documents must be submitted in PDF format.
